name: Endure (itch) (Mr_Innovation)
description:
Elizabeth I'm sorry, I couldn't follow you, they would have hurt me. But some how you did, you got out the city and now I'm here all alone trying to find you and make it right..... Please be okay my love!!

Endure is my first indie game. It is a first person atmospheric driven experience. Turn off all the beacons and try to find Elizabeth but watch out they're out there!!

Follow me on Twitter for more: Danny Burrows (@Mr_Innovation_1) / Twitter
